Structs/SessionCookie.html#/s:13KituraSe.name: name
Structs/SessionCookie.html#/s:13KituraSe.abstract: The name of the cookie - for example, kitura-session-id

Structs/SessionCookie.html#/s:13KituraSe.abstract: Create a new CookieSetup instance which controls how session cookies are created.

Structs/SessionCookie.html.name: SessionCookie
Structs/SessionCookie.html.abstract: Defines the properties of an HTTP Cookie which will be used for a TypeSafeSession.

Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.name: store
Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.abstract: Specifies the Store for session state, or leave nil to use a simple in-memory store.

Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.name: sessionCookie
Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.abstract: A SessionCookie that defines the session cookie’s name and attributes.

Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.name: init(sessionId:)
Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.abstract: Create a new instance (an empty session), where the only known value is the

Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.name: save(callback:)
Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.abstract: Save the current session instance to the store. This also refreshes the expiry.

Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.name: destroy(callback:)
Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.abstract: Destroy the session, removing it and all its associated data from the store.

Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.name: touch(callback:)
Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.abstract: Refreshes the expiry of a session in the store. Note that this is done automatically

Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.name: handle(request:response:completion:)
Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html#/s:13Kitu.abstract: Static handle function that will try and create an instance of Self. It will check the request for the session cookie. If the cookie is not present it will create a cookie and initialize a new session for the user. If a session cookie is found, this function will decode and return an instance of itself from the store.

Protocols/Store.html.name: Store
Protocols/Store.html.abstract: The protocol that defines the API for plugins that store Session data.

Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html.name: TypeSafeSession
Protocols/TypeSafeSession.html.abstract: A TypeSafeMiddleware for managing user sessions. The user defines a final class with the fields they wish to use within the session. This class can then save or destroy itself from a static Store, which is keyed by a sessionId. The sessionId can be extracted from the session cookie to initialise an instance of the user’s class with the session data. If no store is defined, the session will default to an in-memory store.

Extensions/RouterRequest.html#/s:6Kitura.name: session
Extensions/RouterRequest.html#/s:6Kitura.abstract: The session’s state that is stored in a SessionState object.

Extensions/RouterRequest.html.name: RouterRequest
Extensions/RouterRequest.html.abstract: Extension of the RouterRequest class that provides access to the session’s state

Enums/StoreError.html#/s:13KituraSession.name: nilStore
Enums/StoreError.html#/s:13KituraSession.abstract: Indicates that the Store could not be accessed, as its value was nil.

Enums/CookieParameter.html#/s:13KituraSe.abstract: The cookie’s secure attribute, this indicates whether the cookie should be provided only

Enums/CookieParameter.html#/s:13KituraSe.name: maxAge
Enums/CookieParameter.html#/s:13KituraSe.abstract: The cookie’s maxAge attribute, that is, the maximum age (in seconds) from the time of issue that

Enums/CookieParameter.html.name: CookieParameter
Enums/CookieParameter.html.abstract: The parameters for configuring the cookies used to send the session IDs to the clients.

Enums/StoreError.html.name: StoreError
Enums/StoreError.html.abstract: An error indicating the failure of an operation involving the use of a session Store.

Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.name: reload(callback:)
Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.abstract: Reload the session data from the session Store.

Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.name: save(callback:)
Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.abstract: Save the session data to the session Store.

Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.name: destroy(callback:)
Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.abstract: Delete the session data from the session Store.

Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.name: remove(key:)
Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.abstract: Remove an entry from the session data.

Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/SessionState.html#/s:13KituraSes.abstract: Retrieve an entry from the session data.

Classes/Session.html.name: Session
Classes/Session.html.abstract: A pluggable middleware for managing user sessions.

Classes/SessionState.html.name: SessionState
Classes/SessionState.html.abstract: A set of helper functions to manipulate session data.
